subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the Popover UI component.

subMembers.name: animation
subMembers.description: Configures UI component visibility animations. This object contains two fields: [show] and [hide].

subMembers.name: hide
subMembers.description: An object that defines the [animation properties] used when the UI component is being hidden.

subMembers.name: show
subMembers.description: An object that defines the [animation properties] used when the UI component is being shown.

subMembers.name: delay
subMembers.description: The delay in milliseconds after which the UI component is hidden.

subMembers.name: hideEvent
subMembers.description: Specifies properties of popover hiding. Ignored if the [shading] property is set to **true**.

subMembers.name: name
subMembers.description: Specifies the event names on which the UI component is hidden.

subMembers.name: hideOnOutsideClick
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to hide the UI component if a user clicks outside the popover window or outside the target element.

subMembers.name: position
subMembers.default: { my: 'top center', at: 'bottom center', collision: 'fit flip' }
subMembers.description: An object defining UI component [positioning properties].

subMembers.name: delay
subMembers.description: The delay in milliseconds after which the UI component is displayed.

subMembers.name: name
subMembers.description: Specifies the event names on which the UI component is shown.

subMembers.name: showEvent
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for displaying the UI component.

subMembers.name: showTitle
subMembers.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not to display the title in the overlay window.

subMembers.name: target
subMembers.description: Specifies the element against which to position the {WidgetName}.

properties.name: dxPopover
properties.description: The Popover is a UI component that shows notifications within a box with an arrow pointing to a specified UI element.

Methods.name: show(target)
Methods.description: Shows the UI component for a target element.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onHidden
Events.description: A function that is executed after the UI component is hidden.

Events.name: onHiding
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is hidden.

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onShowing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is displayed.

Events.name: onShown
Events.description: A function that is executed after the UI component is displayed.

Events.name: onTitleRendered
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component's [title] is rendered.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: HiddenEvent
Types.description: The type of the [hidden] event handler's argument.

Types.name: HidingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [hiding] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ShowingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [showing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ShownEvent
Types.description: The type of the [shown] event handler's argument.

Types.name: TitleRenderedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [titleRendered] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: dxPopoverAnimation
subMembers.description: Configures UI component visibility animations. This object contains two fields: [show] and [hide].

subMembers.name: hide
subMembers.description: An object that defines the [animation properties] used when the UI component is being hidden.

subMembers.name: show
subMembers.description: An object that defines the [animation properties] used when the UI component is being shown.
